data.message: Why are my videos all messed up??? I watch one video and it works fine, then the next one doesn't?!? It just goes straight to the end of the vid, if I try to replay it it does the same thing! Please what do I do?? I'm on a zte max x 2

replies.message: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Rj. Please report this to us through the app. In the Facebook app, select the More Options button in the top right corner and scroll to the bottom. Then, tap on Report a Problem. -Kevin
